macros module¶

This file contains miscellaneous functions that are used often throughout the project.

macros.commonElement(set1, set2, n=1)[source]

Determine whether list1 and list2 have at least n common elements.

Parameters

  • set1¶ – first arbitrary set of elements

  • set2¶ – second arbitrary set of elements

  • n¶ – minimum number of common elements

Return type

bool

Returns

True if sets have at least minimum number of common elements satisfied. False otherwise.

macros.formatQuantity(quantity)[source]

Format quantity as string with value and unit.

Parameters

quantity¶ – quantity to format

Return type

str

macros.formatUnit(quantity)[source]

Format unit as string from quantity. Display unit as abbreviations. Remove spaces between units.

Parameters

quantity¶ – quantity to format

Return type

str

macros.formatValue(quantity)[source]

Format value for quantity or float. Display full precision. Remove trailing zeros.

Parameters

quantity¶ – quantity or float to format

Return type

str

macros.getElements(indicies, element_list)[source]

Get element(s) at index(es) in list.

__Recursion Base__

return single element: indicies [int]

Parameters

  • indicies¶ – index(es) to retrieve element(s) at

  • element_list¶ – list to retrieve element(s) from

Return type

Union[Any, List[Any]]

Returns

object if indicies is int. list of objects if indicies is list of int.

macros.getIndicies(elements, element_list, element_class=None)[source]

Get indicies of specified element(s) in list.

__Recursion Base__

return single index: elements [element_class] or element_class [None]

Parameters

  • elements¶ – elements to retreive indicies of

  • element_list¶ – collection to search for indicies in

  • element_class¶ – return only elements of this type. Acts as a filter.

Return type

Union[int, List[int]]

Returns

int if elements is a list. list of int if elements is not a list.

macros.getTexImage(name, tex_folder='tex', **kwargs)[source]

Get tex image associated with variable name.

Parameters

  • name¶ – name of variable to retrieve image of

  • tex_folder¶ – folder to retrieve image from

Return type

Union[Image, Text]

Returns

Image if image found in folder. Text if image not found in folder.

macros.toList(obj, object_class=None)[source]

Convert input to list.

Parameters

  • obj¶ – object to convert to a list

  • object_class¶ – class of object if not list

Return type

list

Returns

object itself if object is a list. list containing only the object if object is not a list.

macros.unique(nonunique)[source]

Get collection containing only unique elements.

Parameters

nonunique¶ – collection to retrieve unique elements of

Return type

List[Any]
